message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I still believe $10,000 is a fair price for the product. I am not willing to go higher than that.
